author: 4 Ever Green
description:
Have you ever seen a pink manta ray, a white Iberian lynx, or a blue dog from Chernobyl?
In this countdown, we’re revealing 20 of the rarest-colored animals ever recorded creatures so unbelievable that most people think they’re edited but every one of them is 100% real.
From glowing sharks and orange crocodiles to golden penguins, neon-yellow turtles, purple crabs, pink lobsters, and piebald deer these color mutations show nature at its strangest and most beautiful.

 Featuring:
✔ Pink Manta Ray
✔ White Iberian Lynx
✔ Blue Dogs of Chernobyl
✔ Golden Penguin
✔ Electric-Yellow Turtle
✔ Melanistic & Piebald Deer
and more unbelievable color morphs!

Like, Subscribe, and turn on notifications for more mind-blowing wildlife discoveries!
title: Animals With Colors So Rare Scientists Can't Explain Them
